description:
Looking to hit the lookout by lunch? Osprey’s suspended mesh AirSpeed back panel lets cool air circulate as you pick up the pace on your day hike. Bonus: the HikeLite is hydration-compatible and even has loops for your trekking poles. A bunch of pockets stash everything you need in the right spot: side pockets that fit 1L water bottles and a scratch-free pocket for your sunglasses.

  • Trampoline suspended mesh AirSpeed back panel disperses and balances the load while letting air flow in to cool your back
  • Removable webbing waistbelt adds stability for larger loads
  • Adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
  • Soft lined pocket protects your sunnies from scratches
  • Trekking pole loops and compression straps let you lash on extra gear
  • Custom-sized rain cover stows in its own dedicated pocket so you're always prepared for bad weather
  • Internal hydration sleeve fits a 3L reservoir. (Reservoir sold separately.)
name: Osprey Hikelite 18 Day Pack - Unisex
